happyfool : do you know how i can install mc from command line? (my GUI does not work im trying to fix it)
you need to add the universe repo to sources.list
'sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list'
look for the line with 'universe' in and uncomment it (remove the '#' at the start of the line
then save the file, run 'sudo apt-get update' and try the install command again
Ctrl-W or Ctrl-X, i think
there should be a list at the bottom of the screen
are you using irc from a different computer ?

i think getting your internet connection working should be your first priority; installing extra software will be much easier thereafter
